decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - 1.	Due to its bulk, size and location of the proposed outbuilding it is considered to be excessive and will overdevelop the site, consequently having a detrimental impact on the appearance of the dwellinghouse and the surrounding area. The development is therefore contrary to the provisions of Policy ENV B.1.1 - New Development and Policy H.6.4 - Extensions and Alterations of The London Borough of Hounslow Unitary Development 2003 and Section 7.0 - Detached Outbuildings of the Residential Extension Guidelines.

Condition : 2 - 2.	The proposed development will have an overbearing effect on the adjoining properties and has the potential to affect the privacy of adjoining dwellings. The development is therefore considered to be contrary to the provisions of Policy ENV B.1.1 - New Development and Policy H.6.4 - Extensions and Alterations of The London Borough of Hounslow Unitary Development 2003.
description: Retention of rear extension to existing detached garage at rear of dwellinghouse.
